info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 08 at 7:34PM CDT until August 08 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN DALLAS AND SOUTHEASTERN POLK COUNTIES... At 734 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pleasant Hope, or 10 miles southeast of Bolivar, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pleasant Hope... Morrisville... Halfway... Olive... Brighton... Foose... March... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
